rules_text:
When Slimy Shopkeep enters, create a token that’s a copy of a token you control that’s not named Slimy Shopkeep.
Decompose into Food {2}{G} [i]({2}{G}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that’s a copy of it, except it’s a colorless Food artifact with no mana cost and “{2}, {T}: Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life,” and it loses all other card types. Decompose only as a sorcery.)[/i]
